TEXT.English: The Age of Ice is ended and fertile lands are newly exposed by retreating sheets of ice. The glory of the Age of Magic is long past and the %s2_civ people set forth to build a civilization to recapture that lost knowledge. %s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting you to lead them into the next age, the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.French: L'Age de Glace est terminé et les terres fertiles sont de nouveau exposées par le retrait des glaces en cette année %s1_year. La gloire de l'Age de la Magie est un lointain passé et le peuple des %s2_civ se prépare à fonder une civilisation pour retrouver ce savoir perdu. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, votre peuple vous a confié le pouvoir absolu, vous faisant confiance pour les guider dans le prochain âge, l'Age de la Renaissance.
TEXT.German: Die Eiszeit ist vorüber und die fruchtbaren Lande wurden im %s1_year von den zurückweichenden Eismassen wieder freigegeben. Das ruhmreiche Zeitalter der Magie ist lange vorbei und das %s2_civ Volk ist aufgebrochen, eine neue Zivilisation zu gründen, um das verlorene Wissen wiederzuerlangen. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, euer Volk hat Euch die uneingeschränkte Macht übertragen, darauf vertrauend, dass Ihr es in das nächste Zeitalter führt - das Zeitalter der Wiedergeburt.
TEXT.Italian: The Age of Ice is ended and fertile lands are newly exposed by retreating sheets of ice. The glory of the Age of Magic is long past and the %s2_civ people set forth to build a civilization to recapture that lost knowledge. %s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting you to lead them into the next age, the Age of Rebirth.
TEXT.Spanish: La Edad de Hielo ha terminado y vuelven a aparecer tierras fértiles según van retirándose las placas de hielo. La gloria de la Edad de la Magia hace tiempo que pasó, y el pueblo %s2_civ se prepara para construir una civilización para recuperar ese conocimiento perdido. %s3_leader, vuestro pueblo os ha investido de poder absoluto, confiando en que lo lideraréis hacia una nueva edad, la Edad del Renacimiento.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Melee units in cites with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] promotion which increases their strength. Gaining access to Iron or Mithril will increase the strength of your melee units even further.
TEXT.French: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Melee units in cites with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] promotion which increases their strength. Gaining access to Iron or Mithril will increase the strength of your melee units even further.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch, mit [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kupfer[COLOR_REVERT] habt Ihr eine wichtige strategische Ressource erschlossen! Angeschlossene Städte können damit starke [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nahkampf-Einheiten[COLOR_REVERT] aufstellen, die die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronzewaffen[COLOR_REVERT] erhalten. Durch die Erschließung von Eisen oder Mithril kann die Stärke von Nahkampf-Einheiten sogar noch weiter erhöht werden.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Melee units in cites with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] promotion which increases their strength. Gaining access to Iron or Mithril will increase the strength of your melee units even further.
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulations! You have gained access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], an important strategic resource! Melee units in cites with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] gain the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bronze Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] promotion which increases their strength. Gaining access to Iron or Mithril will increase the strength of your melee units even further.

TEXT.English: Congratulations, you have trained your first Adept Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units gain xp automatically over time, and can use the promotions they gain from leveling up to learn new spells.[PARAGRAPH:1]The promotions an adept has to choose from depend on the mana types the civilization has access too. Every civilization has a few mana types provided by their palace and new mana sources can be gained from some wonders and by using your adepts to change raw mana nodes to mana nodes of the different types.
TEXT.French: Félicitations, vous avez entraîné votre première unité Adepte ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) à %s2City_Name! Ces unités gagnent de l'expérience automatiquement à travers le temps, et peuvent utiliser les promotions qu'elles acquièrent à chaque niveau pour apprendre de nouveaux sorts.[PARAGRAPH:1]Les promotions qu'un adepte peut choisir dépendent des types de mana auxquels la civilisation a accès. Toutes les civilisations ont quelques types de mana fournit par leur palais, de nouvelles sources de mana peuvent être acquises avec quelques Merveilles et d'autres en utilisant vos adeptes pour transformer les nœuds de mana brut en nœuds de mana des différents types.
TEXT.German: Herzlichen Glückwunsch, Ihr habt Euren ersten Adepten ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name [COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name erschaffen! Diese Einheiten gewinnen mit der Zeit von selbst an Erfahrung, und sie können die daraus gewonnenen Beförderungen verwenden, um neue Zauber zu erlernen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Die Beförderungen, unter denen ein Adept auswählen kann, hängen davon ab, welche Mana-Arten Eurer Zivilisation zur Verfügung stehen. Jede Zivilisation erhält einige Mana-Arten durch ihren Palast. Weitere Mana-Arten können durch bestimmte Weltwunder und durch von Adepten auf Mana-Vorkommen errichteten Mana-Quellen verschiedenen Art dazu kommen.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulations, you have trained your first Adept Unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! These units gain xp automatically over time, and can use the promotions they gain from leveling up to learn new spells.[PARAGRAPH:1]The promotions an adept has to choose from depend on the mana types the civilization has access too. Every civilization has a few mana types provided by their palace and new mana sources can be gained from some wonders and by using your adepts to change raw mana nodes to mana nodes of the different types.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades, habéis entrenado a vuestra primera unidad Adepto ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1Unit_Name[COLOR_REVERT]) in %s2City_Name! Estas unidades ganan xp automáticamente con el tiempo, y pueden usar los ascensos que ganen al subir de nivel para aprender nuevos conjuros.[PARAGRAPH:1]Los ascensos que un adepto tiene para elegir dependen de los tipos de maná a los que la civilización tiene acceso. Cada civilización tiene unos pocos tipos de maná provistos por su palacio, y se pueden conseguir nuevas fuentes de maná de algunas maravillas y utilizando a los adeptos para convertir los nodos de maná bruto en nodos de maná de diferentes tipos.

TEXT.English: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the appreciative creature joins your army.
TEXT.French: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the appreciative creature joins your army.
TEXT.German: In dem Wrack ist eine Seeschlange gefangen. Nach ihrer Befreiung schließt sich die dankbare Kreatur Eurer Armee an.
TEXT.Italian: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the appreciative creature joins your army.
TEXT.Spanish: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the appreciative creature joins your army.

TEXT.English: Undead corpses rise from the waters.
TEXT.French: Undead corpses rise from the waters.
TEXT.German: Untote Leichen erheben sich aus dem Wasser.
TEXT.Italian: Undead corpses rise from the waters.
TEXT.Spanish: Undead corpses rise from the waters.

TEXT.English: Your scouts report vicious blue creatures playing in the snow.
TEXT.French: Your scouts report vicious blue creatures playing in the snow.
TEXT.German: Eure Späher berichten von bösartigen blauen Kreaturen, die im Schnee spielen.
TEXT.Italian: Your scouts report vicious blue creatures playing in the snow.
TEXT.Spanish: Your scouts report vicious blue creatures playing in the snow.

TEXT.English: Your exploration has angered some local lizardmen.
TEXT.French: Your exploration has angered some local lizardmen.
TEXT.German: Eure Erkundung hat einige örtliche Echsenmenschen gegen Euch aufgebracht.
TEXT.Italian: Your exploration has angered some local lizardmen.
TEXT.Spanish: Your exploration has angered some local lizardmen.

TEXT.English: An angry scorpion is stirred up by your explorers.
TEXT.French: An angry scorpion is stirred up by your explorers.
TEXT.German: An angry scorpion is stirred up by your explorers.
TEXT.Italian: An angry scorpion is stirred up by your explorers.
TEXT.Spanish: An angry scorpion is stirred up by your explorers.

TEXT.English: Your explorers discover a nest of scorpions.
TEXT.French: Your explorers discover a nest of scorpions.
TEXT.German: Your explorers discover a nest of scorpions.
TEXT.Italian: Your explorers discover a nest of scorpions.
TEXT.Spanish: Your explorers discover a nest of scorpions.

TEXT.English: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the creature turns on you.
TEXT.French: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the creature turns on you.
TEXT.German: In dem Wrack ist eine Seeschlange gefangen. Nach ihrer Befreiung wendet sich die Kreatur gegen Euch.
TEXT.Italian: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the creature turns on you.
TEXT.Spanish: There is a Sea Serpent trapped within the wreckage, after freeing it the creature turns on you.

TEXT.English: The remains of previous explorers rise up to meet you.
TEXT.French: Les corps des précédents explorateurs se dressent face à vous.
TEXT.German: Die Überreste früherer Erkunder erheben sich, um Euch zu begrüßen.
TEXT.Italian: The remains of previous explorers rise up to meet you.
TEXT.Spanish: The remains of previous explorers rise up to meet you.

TEXT.English: The lair is full of webs, there must be a giant spider nearby.
TEXT.French: Les donjon est rempli de toiles ; une araignée géante est sûrement proche.
TEXT.German: Die Höhle ist voller Spinnweben. In der Nähe muss sich eine Riesenspinne befinden.
TEXT.Italian: The lair is full of webs, there must be a giant spider nearby.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair is full of webs, there must be a giant spider nearby.

TEXT.English: The lair is abandoned, but contains supplies you could use in your cities.
TEXT.French: Le donjon est abandonné, mais contient des fournitures que vous pourriez utiliser dans vos villes.
TEXT.German: The lair is abandoned, but contains supplies you could use in your cities.
TEXT.Italian: The lair is abandoned, but contains supplies you could use in your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair is abandoned, but contains supplies you could use in your cities.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds a treasure vault within the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a treasure vault within the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau eine Schatzkammer.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a treasure vault within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a treasure vault within the lair.

TEXT.English: Some jewelry remains on the bodies, you add it to your treasury.
TEXT.French: Quelques bijoux sont encore présents sur les corps. Vous les ajoutez à votre trésorerie.
TEXT.German: Es wurde einiges an Schmuck als Grabbeigabe verwendet. Ihr fügt ihn eurer Schatzkammer hinzu.
TEXT.Italian: Some jewelry remains on the bodies, you add it to your treasury.
TEXT.Spanish: Some jewelry remains on the bodies, you add it to your treasury.

TEXT.French: Des squelettes émergent du sol !
TEXT.German: Es fanden sich einige antike Schriftrollen zwischen den Gebeinen. Ihr übergebt sie euren Gelehrten.

TEXT.French: Spectres haunt this area!
TEXT.German: Skelette steigen aus dem Boden!

TEXT.English: Ancient scrolls are among the remains, you send them to your scholars.
TEXT.French: Ancient scrolls are among the remains, you send them to your scholars.
TEXT.German: Ein Phantom sucht diese Gegend heim!
TEXT.Italian: Ancient scrolls are among the remains, you send them to your scholars.
TEXT.Spanish: Ancient scrolls are among the remains, you send them to your scholars.

TEXT.French: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY] : " Les enchantements nous rendent la vie plus facile"
TEXT.German: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "Verzauberungen machen euer Leben leichter!"
TEXT.Spanish: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "¡Los Encantamientos hace nuestras vidas más fáciles!"

TEXT.French: Héros : %s1
TEXT.German: Held: %s1

TEXT.French: Héros
TEXT.German: Held

TEXT.English: Although goblins aren't normally strong enough to pose a real threat to armies, the Scorpion Clan goblins have two advantages that allow them to claim their land. First, they are organized better than other goblin tribes, and the only ones to build fortifications in the wilderness. Secondly is the greasy poison they coat their weapons with. The creation of the poison is a secret of the Scorpion Clan shamans, and so far the secret has been well kept.
TEXT.French: Although goblins aren't normally strong enough to pose a real threat to armies, the Scorpion Clan goblins have two advantages that allow them to claim their land. First, they are organized better than other goblin tribes, and the only ones to build fortifications in the wilderness. Secondly is the greasy poison they coat their weapons with. The creation of the poison is a secret of the Scorpion Clan shamans, and so far the secret has been well kept.
TEXT.German: Obwohl Goblins normalerweise nicht stark genug sind, um eine wirkliche Gefahr für eine Armee darzustellen, verfügen die Goblins des Skorpionklans über zwei Vorteile, die ihnen erlauben, ihr Land zu beanspruchen. Erstens sind sie besser organisiert als andere Goblinstämme und die einzigen, die in der Wildnis Festungen errichten können. Und zweitens streichen sie ihre Waffen mit einem zähflüssigen Gift ein. Die Herstellung des Giftes ist ein Geheimnis der Schamanen des Skorpionklans, und bis jetzt wurde dieses Geheimnis gut gehütet.
TEXT.Italian: Although goblins aren't normally strong enough to pose a real threat to armies, the Scorpion Clan goblins have two advantages that allow them to claim their land. First, they are organized better than other goblin tribes, and the only ones to build fortifications in the wilderness. Secondly is the greasy poison they coat their weapons with. The creation of the poison is a secret of the Scorpion Clan shamans, and so far the secret has been well kept.
TEXT.Spanish: Although goblins aren't normally strong enough to pose a real threat to armies, the Scorpion Clan goblins have two advantages that allow them to claim their land. First, they are organized better than other goblin tribes, and the only ones to build fortifications in the wilderness. Secondly is the greasy poison they coat their weapons with. The creation of the poison is a secret of the Scorpion Clan shamans, and so far the secret has been well kept.

TEXT.English: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as an Angel
TEXT.French: Un esprit est entré dans votre empire et a ressuscité en Ange.
TEXT.German: Eine Seele hat euer Reich betreten und wurde als Engel wiedergeboren.
TEXT.Italian: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as an Angel
TEXT.Spanish: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as an Angel

TEXT.English: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as a Mane
TEXT.French: Un esprit est entré dans votre empire et a ressuscité en Mânes.
TEXT.German: Eine Seele hat euer Reich betreten und wurde als Geist der Verfallenen wiedergeboren.
TEXT.Italian: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as a Mane
TEXT.Spanish: A spirit has entered your empire and been reborn as a Mane

TEXT.German: Ein Feind hat den Altars des Luonnotar bald fertig gestellt.
TEXT.Italian: An enemy nears completion of the Altar of the Luonnotar
TEXT.Spanish: An enemy nears completion of the Altar of the Luonnotar

TEXT.German: Eure Einheit wurde während der Apokalypse getötet

TEXT.French: A player has cast Arcane Lacuna, your units are unable to cast spells

TEXT.Italian: A player has cast Arcane Lacuna, your units are unable to cast spells
TEXT.Spanish: A player has cast Arcane Lacuna, your units are unable to cast spells

TEXT.French: Votre unité a été tuée dans l'Arène.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit wurde in der Arena getötet

TEXT.Spanish: Your unit has been killed in the Arena

TEXT.French: Votre unité a remporté une victoire dans l'Arène.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit hat in der Arena einen Sieg errungen
TEXT.Italian: Your unit has won a victory in the Arena
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit has won a victory in the Arena

TEXT.French: Un Bébé Araignée est né.
TEXT.German: Eine Baby-Spinne wurde geboren
TEXT.Italian: A Baby Spider has been born
TEXT.Spanish: A Baby Spider has been born

TEXT.French: Unité bannie
TEXT.German: Einheit gebannt

TEXT.French: Unité ennemie bannie
TEXT.German: Feindliche Einheit gebannt

TEXT.English: The Brotherhood of Wardens has provided a unit in your city
TEXT.French: La Confrérie des Gardiens a fourni une unité à votre ville
TEXT.German: Die Bruderschaft der Wächter hat in eurer Stadt eine Einheit bereitgestellt
TEXT.Italian: The Brotherhood of Wardens has provided a unit in your city
TEXT.Spanish: The Brotherhood of Wardens has provided a unit in your city

TEXT.English: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife
TEXT.French: Une partie de la population de votre ville a rejoint le service des Infernaux dans l'après-vie.
TEXT.German: Bei einem Feuer in der Stadt wurde eurer %s1_building Gebäude zerstört.
TEXT.Italian: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife
TEXT.Spanish: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife

TEXT.English: A fire in the city has destroyed your %s1_building
TEXT.French: A fire in the city has destroyed your %s1_building
TEXT.German: Ein Feuer in der Stadt konnte erlogreich gelöscht werden. Glücklicherweise wurden keine Gebäude zerstört.
TEXT.Italian: A fire in the city has destroyed your %s1_building
TEXT.Spanish: A fire in the city has destroyed your %s1_building

TEXT.English: A fire in your city has been put out, fortunately no buildings were destroyed
TEXT.French: A fire in your city has been put out, fortunately no buildings were destroyed
TEXT.German: Ein Teil der Bevölkerung eurer Städte hat damit fortgefahren, den Infernals im Jenseits zu dienen.
TEXT.Italian: A fire in your city has been put out, fortunately no buildings were destroyed
TEXT.Spanish: A fire in your city has been put out, fortunately no buildings were destroyed

TEXT.English: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife
TEXT.French: Une partie de la population de votre ville a rejoint le service des Mercuriens dans l'après-vie.
TEXT.German: Ein Teil der Bevölkerung eurer Städte hat damit fortgefahren, den Mercurians im Jenseits zu dienen.
TEXT.Italian: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife
TEXT.Spanish: Some of your city's population has gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife

TEXT.French: Feasting on the Paladin's flesh has healed your unit

TEXT.Italian: Feasting on the Paladin's flesh has healed your unit
TEXT.Spanish: Feasting on the Paladin's flesh has healed your unit

TEXT.English: Loki has caused unrest in one of your cities
TEXT.French: Loki a causé des troubles dans une de vos villes
TEXT.German: Loki hat Unruhe in einer eurer Städte verursacht
TEXT.Italian: Loki has caused unrest in one of your cities
TEXT.Spanish: Loki has caused unrest in one of your cities

TEXT.English: Loki has caused unrest in an opponent's city
TEXT.French: Loki a causé des troubles dans une ville adverse
TEXT.German: Loki hat Unruhe in einer gegnerischen Stadt verursacht
TEXT.Italian: Loki has caused unrest in an opponent's city
TEXT.Spanish: Loki has caused unrest in an opponent's city

TEXT.English: The city has fallen into unrest
TEXT.French: La ville se révolte.
TEXT.German: In der Stadt sind Unruhen ausgebrochen
TEXT.Italian: The city has fallen into unrest
TEXT.Spanish: The city has fallen into unrest

TEXT.English: The city rallies behind the protestor, you leave in shame
TEXT.French: La ville se rallie derrière le protestataire, vous partez dans la honte.
TEXT.German: Die Stadtbevölkerung versammelte sich hinter den Protestierenden, Du verlässt das Geschehen in Schande.
TEXT.Italian: The city rallies behind the protestor, you leave in shame
TEXT.Spanish: The city rallies behind the protestor, you leave in shame

TEXT.English: You have publically humiliated the protestor, the city celebrates your wisdom
TEXT.French: vous avez publiquement humilié le protestataire, la ville célèbre votre sagesse.
TEXT.German: Du hast den Protestierenden öffentlich gedemütigt, Die Stadtbevölkerung feiert deine Weisheit !
TEXT.Italian: You have publically humiliated the protestor, the city celebrates your wisdom
TEXT.Spanish: You have publically humiliated the protestor, the city celebrates your wisdom

TEXT.French: Unité perdue par Domination
TEXT.German: Ein Zauberer hat die Kontrolle über deine Einheit übernommen

TEXT.French: Unité gagnée par Domination
TEXT.German: Dein Zauberer hat die Kontrolle über eine Einheit übernommen

TEXT.English: Your caster failed to Dominate the enemy unit.
TEXT.French: Votre lanceur de sorts a perdu la capacité de lancer Domination
TEXT.German: Dein Zauberer hat die Fähigkeit verloren den Zauber "Kontrolle übernehmen" zu sprechen
TEXT.Italian: Your caster has lost the ability to cast Domination
TEXT.Spanish: Your caster has lost the ability to cast Domination

TEXT.English: You lost %d1 gold to the Entertain spell
TEXT.French: You lost %d1 gold to the Entertain spell
TEXT.German: Die Unterhaltung kostet dich %D1 Gold
TEXT.Italian: You lost %d1 gold to the Entertain spell
TEXT.Spanish: You lost %d1 gold to the Entertain spell

TEXT.English: You gained %d1 gold from the Entertain spell
TEXT.French: You gained %d1 gold from the Entertain spell
TEXT.German: Deine Unterhaltung bringt dir %D1 Gold ein
TEXT.Italian: You gained %d1 gold from the Entertain spell
TEXT.Spanish: You gained %d1 gold from the Entertain spell

TEXT.English: A powerful enemy has arisen to defend the lair.
TEXT.French: Un ennemi puissant surgit, prêt à défendre le donjon.
TEXT.German: Ein mächtiger Gegner ist erwacht, um den Bau zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: A powerful enemy has arisen to defend the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: A powerful enemy has arisen to defend the lair.

TEXT.English: A misshapen creature arises from the blighted forest and attacks you!
TEXT.French: Une créature difforme surgit de la forêt funeste et vous attaque !
TEXT.German: A misshapen creature arises from the blighted forest and attacks you!
TEXT.Italian: A misshapen creature arises from the blighted forest and attacks you!
TEXT.Spanish: A misshapen creature arises from the blighted forest and attacks you!

TEXT.English: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.French: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.German: Einen Muschelkolonie hat unter dem Wrack ihre Heimat gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage.
TEXT.Spanish: A colony of clams makes its home beneath the wreckage.

TEXT.English: You discover a thick vein of copper ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a thick vein of copper ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt eine reiche Kupferader unter dem Bau.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a thick vein of copper ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a thick vein of copper ore beneath the lair.

TEXT.English: Furious crabs defend their home from exploration. Though aggressive they taste wonderful with a nice butter sauce.
TEXT.French: Furious crabs defend their home from exploration. Though aggressive they taste wonderful with a nice butter sauce.
TEXT.German: Wütende Krabben schützen ihre Heimat vor der Erkundung. Obwohl sie aggressiv sind, schmecken sie doch köstlich mit einer guten Buttersoße.
TEXT.Italian: Furious crabs defend their home from exploration. Though aggressive they taste wonderful with a nice butter sauce.
TEXT.Spanish: Furious crabs defend their home from exploration. Though aggressive they taste wonderful with a nice butter sauce.

TEXT.English: A huge school of fish make their home in the wreckage.
TEXT.French: A huge school of fish make their home in the wreckage.
TEXT.German: Eine riesiger Fischschwarm hat unter dem Wrack seine Heimat gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: A huge school of fish make their home in the wreckage.
TEXT.Spanish: A huge school of fish make their home in the wreckage.

TEXT.English: Your unit is disappointed to find that their isn't any wealth within the lair, until he notices that the earthen walls glitter with raw gemstones.
TEXT.French: Your unit is disappointed to find that their isn't any wealth within the lair, until he notices that the earthen walls glitter with raw gemstones.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit ist enttäuscht, dass in dem Bau scheinbar nichts wertvolles zu finden ist, bis sie bemerkt, dass an den Wänden aus Erde rohe Edelsteine funkeln.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit is disappointed to find that their isn't any wealth within the lair, until he notices that the earthen walls glitter with raw gemstones.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit is disappointed to find that their isn't any wealth within the lair, until he notices that the earthen walls glitter with raw gemstones.

TEXT.English: You discover a thick vein of gold ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a thick vein of gold ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt eine reiche Goldader unter dem Bau.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a thick vein of gold ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a thick vein of gold ore beneath the lair.

TEXT.English: You discover a thick vein of iron ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a thick vein of iron ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt eine reiche Eisenader unter dem Bau.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a thick vein of iron ore beneath the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a thick vein of iron ore beneath the lair.

TEXT.English: The lair was set upon a raw mana node.
TEXT.French: The lair was set upon a raw mana node.
TEXT.German: Der Bau befindet sich direkt über einer Manaquelle.
TEXT.Italian: The lair was set upon a raw mana node.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair was set upon a raw mana node.

TEXT.English: You discover a cache of bronze weapons within the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a cache of bronze weapons within the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt in dem Bau ein Lager mit Bronzewaffen.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a cache of bronze weapons within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a cache of bronze weapons within the lair.

TEXT.English: It's a trap, all the units in the tile are held until another unit comes to free them.
TEXT.French: It's a trap, all the units in the tile are held until another unit comes to free them.
TEXT.German: Es ist eine Falle. Alle Einheiten auf dem Geländefeld werden festgehalten, bis eine andere Einheit das Geländefeld betritt und sie befreit.
TEXT.Italian: It's a trap, all the units in the tile are held until another unit comes to free them.
TEXT.Spanish: It's a trap, all the units in the tile are held until another unit comes to free them.

TEXT.English: The lair collapses. Your unit scrambles out of the rubble near death.
TEXT.French: Le repaire s'effondre. Votre unité se rue hors des décombres grièvement blessée.
TEXT.German: Der Bau bricht ein. Eure Einheit klettert, dem Tode nah, aus dem Schutt.
TEXT.Italian: The lair collapses. Your unit scrambles out of the rubble near death.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair collapses. Your unit scrambles out of the rubble near death.

TEXT.English: The lower level of the lair is partially submerged, touching the water fills your unit with visions that drive him mad.
TEXT.French: The lower level of the lair is partially submerged, touching the water fills your unit with visions that drive him mad.
TEXT.German: Die untere Ebene des Baus ist teilweise verschüttet. Als sie das Wasser berührt, wird der Verstand Eurer Einheit von Visionen überflutet, die sie verrückt werden lassen.
TEXT.Italian: The lower level of the lair is partially submerged, touching the water fills your unit with visions that drive him mad.
TEXT.Spanish: The lower level of the lair is partially submerged, touching the water fills your unit with visions that drive him mad.

TEXT.English: Your unit never returns from the depths of the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit never returns from the depths of the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit kehrt nie aus dem Inneren des Baus zurück.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit never returns from the depths of the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit never returns from the depths of the lair.

TEXT.English: Rotting corpses fill the lair and fat red insects feed on them. One of them stings your unit and infects him with a horrid disease.
TEXT.French: Rotting corpses fill the lair and fat red insects feed on them. One of them stings your unit and infects him with a horrid disease.
TEXT.German: Der Bau ist mit verottenden Leichen gefüllt, an denen sich dicke rote Insekten laben. Eines dieser Insekten sticht Eure Einheit und infiziert sie mit einer entsetzlichen Krankheit.
TEXT.Italian: Rotting corpses fill the lair and fat red insects feed on them. One of them stings your unit and infects him with a horrid disease.
TEXT.Spanish: Rotting corpses fill the lair and fat red insects feed on them. One of them stings your unit and infects him with a horrid disease.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds an enchanted blade within the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds an enchanted blade within the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau ein verzaubertes Messer.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds an enchanted blade within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds an enchanted blade within the lair.

TEXT.English: A cruel red sword hangs within the lair. Picking it up your unit is overcome with a powerful rage.
TEXT.French: A cruel red sword hangs within the lair. Picking it up your unit is overcome with a powerful rage.
TEXT.German: Ein grausam aussehendes rotes Schwert liegt mitten in dem Bau. Als sie es aufhebt, wird Eure Einheit von einer mächtigen Wut durchflutet.
TEXT.Italian: A cruel red sword hangs within the lair. Picking it up your unit is overcome with a powerful rage.
TEXT.Spanish: A cruel red sword hangs within the lair. Picking it up your unit is overcome with a powerful rage.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds an enchanted sheath of flaming arrows within the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds an enchanted sheath of flaming arrows within the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau einen verzauberten Köcher mit Feuerpfeilen.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds an enchanted sheath of flaming arrows within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds an enchanted sheath of flaming arrows within the lair.

TEXT.English: The tale of your armies' exploration spreads throughout your empire, sparking a new golden age.
TEXT.French: The tale of your armies' exploration spreads throughout your empire, sparking a new golden age.
TEXT.German: Die Geschichte der Erkundungen Eurer Armee verbreiten sich im gesamten Reich und lösen ein neues Goldenes Zeitalter aus.
TEXT.Italian: The tale of your armies' exploration spreads throughout your empire, sparking a new golden age.
TEXT.Spanish: The tale of your armies' exploration spreads throughout your empire, sparking a new golden age.

TEXT.English: You discover a cache of iron weapons within the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a cache of iron weapons within the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt in dem Bau ein Lager mit Eisenwaffen.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a cache of iron weapons within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a cache of iron weapons within the lair.

TEXT.English: You discover a cache of mithril weapons within the lair.
TEXT.French: You discover a cache of mithril weapons within the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr entdeckt in dem Bau ein Lager mit Mithrilwaffen.
TEXT.Italian: You discover a cache of mithril weapons within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You discover a cache of mithril weapons within the lair.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds a basket of apples within the lair. Eating one transforms your unit.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a basket of apples within the lair. Eating one transforms your unit.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau einen Korb Äpfel. Als sie einen ißt, wird Eure Einheit verwandelt.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a basket of apples within the lair. Eating one transforms your unit.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a basket of apples within the lair. Eating one transforms your unit.

TEXT.English: The lair is empty; your unit destroys it without incident.
TEXT.French: The lair is empty; your unit destroys it without incident.
TEXT.German: Der Bau ist leer. Eure Einheit zerstört ihn ohne Zwischenfälle.
TEXT.Italian: The lair is empty; your unit destroys it without incident.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair is empty; your unit destroys it without incident.

TEXT.English: A laboratory exists within the lair. Destroying it creates a cloud of black gas that infects your unit with a wasting plague.
TEXT.French: A laboratory exists within the lair. Destroying it creates a cloud of black gas that infects your unit with a wasting plague.
TEXT.German: In dem Bau befindet sich ein Labor. Als sie es zerstört, wird eine Wolke schwarzen Gases freigesetzt, die Eure Einheit mit einer schwächenden Seuche infiziert.
TEXT.Italian: A laboratory exists within the lair. Destroying it creates a cloud of black gas that infects your unit with a wasting plague.
TEXT.Spanish: A laboratory exists within the lair. Destroying it creates a cloud of black gas that infects your unit with a wasting plague.

TEXT.English: A Scorpion Clan goblin attacks your unit as he explores the lair. Your unit defeats him but not before the goblin stabs him with a poisoned sword.
TEXT.French: A Scorpion Clan goblin attacks your unit as he explores the lair. Your unit defeats him but not before the goblin stabs him with a poisoned sword.
TEXT.German: Ein Goblin des Skorpionklans greift Eure Einheit an, während sie den Bau erkundet. Eure Einheit besiegt ihn, aber zuvor kann der Goblin ihr noch einen Stich mit einem vergifteten Schwert versetzen.
TEXT.Italian: A Scorpion Clan goblin attacks your unit as he explores the lair. Your unit defeats him but not before the goblin stabs him with a poisoned sword.
TEXT.Spanish: A Scorpion Clan goblin attacks your unit as he explores the lair. Your unit defeats him but not before the goblin stabs him with a poisoned sword.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds a poisoned blade within the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a poisoned blade within the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau ein vergiftetes Messer.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a poisoned blade within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a poisoned blade within the lair.

TEXT.English: Your unit comes out far away.
TEXT.French: Your unit comes out far away.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit kommt weit entfernt wieder an die Oberfläche.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit comes out far away.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit comes out far away.

TEXT.English: Though it seems empty, occasional moans echo through the lair. Following them your unit encounters a violent spirit that possesses him.
TEXT.French: Though it seems empty, occasional moans echo through the lair. Following them your unit encounters a violent spirit that possesses him.
TEXT.German: Obwohl sie leer erscheint, hallt gelegentliches Stöhnen durch den Bau. Als sie dem Geräusch folgt, trifft Eure Einheit auf einen gewalttätigen Geist, der von ihr Besitz ergreift.
TEXT.Italian: Though it seems empty, occasional moans echo through the lair. Following them your unit encounters a violent spirit that possesses him.
TEXT.Spanish: Though it seems empty, occasional moans echo through the lair. Following them your unit encounters a violent spirit that possesses him.

TEXT.English: A goblin shaman curses your unit as he flees the lair. Your unit's weapons turn to rust.
TEXT.French: Un chaman gobelin maudit votre unité tandis qu'il fuit le repaire. Les armes de votre unité rouillent instantanément.
TEXT.German: Ein Goblin-Schamane verflucht Eure Einheit, als sie aus dem Bau flieht. Die Waffen Eurer Einheit verwandeln sich in Rost.
TEXT.Italian: A goblin shaman curses your unit as he flees the lair. Your unit's weapons turn to rust.
TEXT.Spanish: A goblin shaman curses your unit as he flees the lair. Your unit's weapons turn to rust.

TEXT.English: You find an old shield inscribed with the symbol of Dagda within the lair.
TEXT.French: You find an old shield inscribed with the symbol of Dagda within the lair.
TEXT.German: Ihr findet in dem Bau einen alten Schild, auf dem das Symbol von Dagda eingraviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: You find an old shield inscribed with the symbol of Dagda within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: You find an old shield inscribed with the symbol of Dagda within the lair.

TEXT.English: Your unit finds a spellstaff within the lair.
TEXT.French: Your unit finds a spellstaff within the lair.
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit findet in dem Bau einen Zauberstab.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit finds a spellstaff within the lair.
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit finds a spellstaff within the lair.

TEXT.English: The lair is full of corpses. After burying them and performing rites a spirit rises from the graves and blesses your unit.
TEXT.French: The lair is full of corpses. After burying them and performing rites a spirit rises from the graves and blesses your unit.
TEXT.German: Der Bau ist mit Leichen gefüllt. Nachdem sie sie begraben und die nötigen Rituale durchgeführt hat, erhebt sich ein Geist aus den Gräbern und segnet Eure Einheit.
TEXT.Italian: The lair is full of corpses. After burying them and performing rites a spirit rises from the graves and blesses your unit.
TEXT.Spanish: The lair is full of corpses. After burying them and performing rites a spirit rises from the graves and blesses your unit.

TEXT.English: You find a map within the lair that gives direction to a distant treasure.
TEXT.French: You find a map within the lair that gives direction to a distant treasure.
TEXT.German: Ihr findet in dem Bau eine Karte, die zu einem entfernten Schatz führt.
TEXT.Italian: You find a map within the lair that gives direction to a distant treasure.
TEXT.Spanish: You find a map within the lair that gives direction to a distant treasure.

TEXT.French: Le coffre est vide.
TEXT.German: Die Truhe ist leer

TEXT.English: A statue is built at the center of the lair, your unit tries to topple it but when he touches it his arms shrivel and weaken.
TEXT.French: A statue is built at the center of the lair, your unit tries to topple it but when he touches it his arms shrivel and weaken.
TEXT.German: Mitten in dem Bau ist eine Statue errichtet worden. Eure Einheit versucht, sie umzustoßen, aber als sie sie berührt, erlahmen und verkümmern ihre Arme.
TEXT.Italian: A statue is built at the center of the lair, your unit tries to topple it but when he touches it his arms shrivel and weaken.
TEXT.Spanish: A statue is built at the center of the lair, your unit tries to topple it but when he touches it his arms shrivel and weaken.

TEXT.English: You received a free Tech from the Eyes and Ears Network
TEXT.French: Vous avez reçu une technologie gratuite de la part du réseau des Yeux et Oreilles
TEXT.German: Du empfängst eine Technologie vom Netzwerk der Augen und Ohren
TEXT.Italian: You received a free Tech from the Eyes and Ears Network
TEXT.Spanish: You received a free Tech from the Eyes and Ears Network

TEXT.French: [NUM1:Votre:Votre:Vos:Vos] %s1 [NUM1:s'enfuit:s'enfuit:s'enfuient:s'enfuient].
TEXT.German: [NUM1:Euer:Eure:Euer:Eure:Eure:Eure] %s1 flieh[NUM1:t:t:t:en:en:en] in Panik.

TEXT.French: [NUM1:Un:Une:Des:Des] %s1 [NUM1:s'enfuit:s'enfuit:s'enfuient:s'enfuient].
TEXT.German: [NUM1:Ein:Eine:Ein:Mehrere:Mehrere:Mehrere] %s1 flieh[NUM1:t:t:t:en:en:en] in Panik.

TEXT.French: Un incendie s'est déclaré.
TEXT.German: Ein Feuer ist ausgebrochen.

TEXT.French: Un joueur a lancé %s1
TEXT.German: Ein Spieler hat %s1 gezaubert

TEXT.French: Le combat vous rapporte %d1[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.German: Du erhälst %d1 Gold nach dem Kampf

TEXT.English: The stones surrounding the Guardian have come to life!
TEXT.French: The stones surrounding the Guardian have come to life!
TEXT.German: Die den Wächter umgebende Steine erwachen zum Leben!
TEXT.Italian: The stones surrounding the Guardian have come to life!
TEXT.Spanish: The stones surrounding the Guardian have come to life!

TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName défend votre %s2_UnitName.
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName verteidigt eure/r %s2_UnitName.

TEXT.French: Dégâts changés par la lame d'Hastur
TEXT.German: Schaden verteilt durch Hasturs Klingen

TEXT.French: Heros Ressuscité!
TEXT.German: Held wiedergeboren!

TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName est trop effrayé pour attaquer
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName hat zuviel Angst um anzugreifen

TEXT.French: un Balor est apparu!
TEXT.German: Ein Balor ist erschienen!

TEXT.French: Votre sagesse inspire le peuple.
TEXT.German: Eure Weisheit erfüllt euer Volk mit Vertrauen.

TEXT.English: You can't help feeling you made the wrong choice.
TEXT.French: You can't help feeling you made the wrong choice.
TEXT.German: Ihr werdet das Gefühl nicht los, dass Ihr die falsche Wahl getroffen habt.
TEXT.Italian: You can't help feeling you made the wrong choice.
TEXT.Spanish: You can't help feeling you made the wrong choice.

TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName tué par les dégâts de %s2
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName getötet von %s2

TEXT.French: Antre Détruite!
TEXT.German: Ein Unterschlupf wurde zerstört!

TEXT.English: Your unit has entered Letum Frigus
TEXT.French: Your unit has entered Letum Frigus
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit hat den Letum Frigus betreten
TEXT.Italian: Your unit has entered Letum Frigus
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit has entered Letum Frigus

TEXT.French: Unité détruite par le Maelstrom
TEXT.German: Einheit vom Strudel Zerstört

TEXT.English: Unit enters the Maelstrom and comes out in a new location
TEXT.French: Une unité entre dans le Maelstrom et arrive dans un nouveau lieu
TEXT.German: Eine Einheit gerät in den Strudel und erscheint wieder an einem neuen Ort
TEXT.Italian: Unit enters the Maelstrom and comes out in a new location
TEXT.Spanish: Unit enters the Maelstrom and comes out in a new location

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 au Compteur Armageddon
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 zum Armageddonzähler

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the Armageddon Counter when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the Armageddon Counter when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 zum Armageddonzähler Wenn eine lebende Einheit im Kampf getötet wurde.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the Armageddon Counter when a living unit is killed in combat
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1 to the Armageddon Counter when a living unit is killed in combat

TEXT.English: A %s1_unit has risen from Mokka's Cauldron
TEXT.French: le Chaudron de Mokka a créé une nouvelle unité : %s1
TEXT.German: Mokkas' Kessel der Untoten hat eine neue Einheit erschaffen : %s1
TEXT.Italian: A %s1_unit has risen from Mokka's Cauldron
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1_unit has risen from Mokka's Cauldron

TEXT.English: An Acolyte has joined your cause
TEXT.French: Un Acolyte a rejoint votre cause.
TEXT.German: Ein Akolyt hat sich deinem Ziel angeschlossen
TEXT.Italian: An Acolyte has joined your cause
TEXT.Spanish: An Acolyte has joined your cause

TEXT.English: A Crusader has joined your cause
TEXT.French: Un Croisé a rejoint votre cause.
TEXT.German: Ein Kreuzritter hat sich deinem Ziel angeschlossen
TEXT.Italian: A Crusader has joined your cause
TEXT.Spanish: A Crusader has joined your cause

TEXT.French: La Hache d'Orthus a changé de main.
TEXT.German: Orthus' Axt hat den Besitzer gewechselt.

TEXT.English: Your people approve of your decision
TEXT.French: Your people approve of your decision
TEXT.German: Eure Leute Stimmen eurer Entscheidung zu
TEXT.Italian: Your people approve of your decision
TEXT.Spanish: Your people approve of your decision

TEXT.French: Your people protest your decision
TEXT.German: Eure Leute protestieren gegen eure Entscheidung

TEXT.English: The population of your city has been reduced by pestilence
TEXT.French: The population of your city has been reduced by pestilence
TEXT.German: Die Bevölkerung deiner Stadt wurde reduziert von der Pestilenz
TEXT.Italian: The population of your city has been reduced by pestilence
TEXT.Spanish: The population of your city has been reduced by pestilence

TEXT.English: Barnaxus has been resurrected, the Pieces of Barnaxus disappear
TEXT.French: Barnaxus has been resurrected, the Pieces of Barnaxus disappear
TEXT.German: Barnaxus wurde wiedergeboren, die Bruchstücke sind verschwunden
TEXT.Italian: Barnaxus has been resurrected, the Pieces of Barnaxus disappear
TEXT.Spanish: Barnaxus has been resurrected, the Pieces of Barnaxus disappear

TEXT.English: The Pieces of Barnaxus have changed hands
TEXT.French: Les Morceaux de Barnaxus ont changé de main.
TEXT.German: Die Bruchstücke von Barnaxus haben den Besitzer gewechselt
TEXT.Italian: The Pieces of Barnaxus have changed hands
TEXT.Spanish: The Pieces of Barnaxus have changed hands

TEXT.English: A pirate ship has plundered gold
TEXT.French: Un navire pirate a pillé de l'or.
TEXT.German: Ein Piratenschiff hat Gold gestohlen
TEXT.Italian: A pirate ship has plundered gold
TEXT.Spanish: A pirate ship has plundered gold

TEXT.French: Unité Ennemie Pestiférée.
TEXT.German: Feindliche Einheit verseucht

TEXT.French: Unité Pestiférée.
TEXT.German: Einheit verseucht

TEXT.English: Creature entered your city through the Planar Gate
TEXT.French: Une créature est entrée dans votre ville grâce au Portail Planaire
TEXT.German: Durch das Tor zu äußeren Ebene ist eine Kreatur in eure Stadt gekommen
TEXT.Italian: Creature entered your city through the Planar Gate
TEXT.Spanish: Creature entered your city through the Planar Gate

TEXT.French: Unit cured of Disease
TEXT.German: Der See der Tränen hat eine erkrankte Einheit geheilt

TEXT.French: Unit cured of the Plague
TEXT.German: Der See der Tränen hat eine verseuchte Einheit geheilt

TEXT.French: Unit cured of Poison
TEXT.German: Der See der Tränen hat eine vergiftete Einheit geheilt

TEXT.French: Unit cured of Withering
TEXT.German: Der See der Tränen hat eine Einheit von Atrophie geheilt

TEXT.English: The population of your city has been reduced by an Angel of Death
TEXT.French: The population of your city has been reduced by an Angel of Death
TEXT.German: Die Bevölkerung eurer Stadt wurde durch einen Todesengel reduziert
TEXT.Italian: The population of your city has been reduced by an Angel of Death
TEXT.Spanish: The population of your city has been reduced by an Angel of Death

TEXT.French: Promotion stolen
TEXT.German: Beförderung gestohlen

TEXT.English: Your people celebrate the destruction of the Pyre of the Seraphic. But your actions have angered the Queen of Fire and wild Fire Elementals have appeared in the region to enact her revenge.
TEXT.French: Votre peuple célèbre la destruction du Bûcher des Séraphins. Mais vos actes ont courroucé la Reine du Feu. En représailles, elle a envoyé des Élémentaires de Feu dans la région.
TEXT.German: Euer Volk feiert die Zerstörung des Scheiterhaufens der Engel. Aber Euer Vorgehen hat die Königin des Feuers verärgert und wilde Feuerelementare sind in Eurem Reich erschienen, um ihre Rachegelüste zu befriedigen.
TEXT.Italian: Your people celebrate the destruction of the Pyre of the Seraphic. But your actions have angered the Queen of Fire and wild Fire Elementals have appeared in the region to enact her revenge.
TEXT.Spanish: Your people celebrate the destruction of the Pyre of the Seraphic. But your actions have angered the Queen of Fire and wild Fire Elementals have appeared in the region to enact her revenge.

TEXT.French: Ressource découverte
TEXT.German: Ressource entdeckt

TEXT.English: Camulos will not allow your act to go unpunished.
TEXT.French: Camulos ne laissera pas vos actes impunis.
TEXT.German: Camulos wird nicht erlauben dass deine Tat unbestraft bleibt.
TEXT.Italian: Camulos will not allow your act to go unpunished.
TEXT.Spanish: Camulos will not allow your act to go unpunished.

TEXT.French: Un esclave s'est révolté.
TEXT.German: Ein Sklave hat revoltiert

TEXT.English: A soul has been processed by the Soul Forge
TEXT.French: Une âme a été traitée par la Forge des Âmes.
TEXT.German: In der Seelenschmiede wurde eine Seele verarbeitet.
TEXT.Italian: A soul has been processed by the Soul Forge
TEXT.Spanish: A soul has been processed by the Soul Forge

TEXT.French: Unité retenue.
TEXT.German: Einheit gehalten.

TEXT.French: Unité repoussée.
TEXT.German: Einheit wurde zurückgedrängt.

TEXT.French: Sort Contré.
TEXT.German: Zauber widerstanden

TEXT.English: A Spirit Guide has moved to another unit
TEXT.French: Un Guide Spirituel est allé vers une autre unité.
TEXT.German: Eine Guru-Beförderung wurde auf eine andere Einheit übertragen.
TEXT.Italian: A Spirit Guide has moved to another unit
TEXT.Spanish: A Spirit Guide has moved to another unit

TEXT.English: Your unit has split in two
TEXT.French: Your unit has split in two
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit hat sich zweigeteilt.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit has split in two
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit has split in two

TEXT.English: Travellers speak of a mighty Dragon, who wants to make %s1_city his lair
TEXT.French: Des voyageurs signalent l'apparition d'un puissant dragon, qui a décidé de faire de %s1_city son repaire.
TEXT.German: Travellers speak of a mighty Dragon, who wants to make %s1_city his lair
TEXT.Italian: Travellers speak of a mighty Dragon, who wants to make %s1_city his lair
TEXT.Spanish: Travellers speak of a mighty Dragon, who wants to make %s1_city his lair

TEXT.English: The burden of killing the living has weakened your Repentant Angel
TEXT.French: The burden of killing the living has weakened your Repentant Angel
TEXT.German: Die Bürde der Ermordung einer lebenden Einheit hat euren reumütigen Engel geschwächt
TEXT.Italian: The burden of killing the living has weakened your Repentant Angel
TEXT.Spanish: The burden of killing the living has weakened your Repentant Angel

TEXT.English: Your unit has been pulled through a dimensional flare
TEXT.French: Your unit has been pulled through a dimensional flare
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit wurde durch eine Ausströmung von Dimensionsmagie gezogen.
TEXT.Italian: Your unit has been pulled through a dimensional flare
TEXT.Spanish: Your unit has been pulled through a dimensional flare

TEXT.English: An elemental has spawned to defend your Tower of the Elements
TEXT.French: Un Élémentaire est apparu pour défendre votre Tour des Éléments.
TEXT.German: Ein Elementar ist erschienen um euren Turm der Elemente zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: An elemental has spawned to defend your Tower of the Elements
TEXT.Spanish: An elemental has spawned to defend your Tower of the Elements

TEXT.English: A fire trap engulfs your unit
TEXT.French: A fire trap engulfs your unit
TEXT.German: Eine Feuerfalle enthüllt eure Einheit
TEXT.Italian: A fire trap engulfs your unit
TEXT.Spanish: A fire trap engulfs your unit

TEXT.English: A poison needle trap is set off as you open the chest
TEXT.French: A poison needle trap is set off as you open the chest
TEXT.German: Als du die Truhe öffnest kommen dir Giftpfeile entgegen.
TEXT.Italian: A poison needle trap is set off as you open the chest
TEXT.Spanish: A poison needle trap is set off as you open the chest

TEXT.English: A trap sets off a cloud of spores that paralyze your unit
TEXT.French: A trap sets off a cloud of spores that paralyze your unit
TEXT.German: Eine Falle setzt seine Wolke aus Sporen frei die deine Einheit lähmt.
TEXT.Italian: A trap sets off a cloud of spores that paralyze your unit
TEXT.Spanish: A trap sets off a cloud of spores that paralyze your unit

TEXT.English: A Treant defender has appeared in the ancient forest
TEXT.French: Un Homarbre est apparu dans une forêt ancestrale.
TEXT.German: Ein freundlicher Baumhirte ist im alten Wald erschienen
TEXT.Italian: A Treant defender has appeared in the ancient forest
TEXT.Spanish: A Treant defender has appeared in the ancient forest

TEXT.English: An enemy Treant has appeared in the ancient forest
TEXT.French: Un Homarbre ennemi est apparu dans une forêt ancestrale.
TEXT.German: Ein feindlicher Baumhirte ist im alten Wald erschienen
TEXT.Italian: An enemy Treant has appeared in the ancient forest
TEXT.Spanish: An enemy Treant has appeared in the ancient forest

TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName vous a abandonné.
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName hat euch verlassen.

TEXT.French: Une unité vous abandonne.
TEXT.German: Eine Einheit verlässt euch.

TEXT.English: A unit converts to your cause
TEXT.French: Une unité s'est convertie à votre cause.
TEXT.German: Eine Einheit konvertiert auf eure Seite.
TEXT.Italian: A unit converts to your cause
TEXT.Spanish: A unit converts to your cause

TEXT.English: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife
TEXT.French: Certaines de vos unités ont rejoint le service des Infernaux dans l'après-vie.
TEXT.German: Einige eurer Einheiten haben damit fortgefahren, den Infernals im Jenseits zu dienen.
TEXT.Italian: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife
TEXT.Spanish: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Infernals in the afterlife

TEXT.French: Unité soignée
TEXT.German: Einheit geheilt.

TEXT.French: Unité blessée
TEXT.German: Unit damaged

TEXT.French: Unité Empoisonnée.
TEXT.German: Einheit vergiftet.

TEXT.French: Unité Ennemie Empoisonnée.
TEXT.German: Feindliche Einheit vergiftet.

TEXT.English: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife
TEXT.French: Certaines de vos unités ont rejoint le service des Mercuriens dans l'après-vie.
TEXT.German: Einige Einheiten haben damit fortgefahren, den Mercurians im Jenseits zu dienen.
TEXT.Italian: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife
TEXT.Spanish: Some of your units have gone on to serve the Mercurians in the afterlife

TEXT.French: Campement Détruit
TEXT.German: Siedlung Zerstört

TEXT.French: Unité améliorée avec des Armes de Bronze
TEXT.German: Einheit mit Bronzewaffen ausgerüstet

TEXT.French: Unité améliorée avec des Armes d'Acier
TEXT.German: Einheit mit Eisenwaffen ausgerüstet

TEXT.French: Unité améliorée avec des Armes de Mithril
TEXT.German: Einheit mit Mithrilwaffen ausgerüstet

TEXT.English: The farmer transformed into a werewolf. The Brotherhood killed him.
TEXT.French: The farmer transformed into a werewolf. The Brotherhood killed him.
TEXT.German: Der Bauer hat sich in einen Werwolf verwandelt!
TEXT.Italian: The farmer transformed into a werewolf. The Brotherhood killed him.
TEXT.Spanish: The farmer transformed into a werewolf. The Brotherhood killed him.

TEXT.English: The farmer has transformed into a werewolf!
TEXT.French: The farmer has transformed into a werewolf!
TEXT.German: Der Bauer hat sich in einen Werwolf verwandelt. Die Bruderschaft hat ihn aber rechtzeitig getötet.
TEXT.Italian: The farmer has transformed into a werewolf!
TEXT.Spanish: The farmer has transformed into a werewolf!

TEXT.English: Unit upgraded to a Wolf Rider
TEXT.French: Unit upgraded to a Wolf Rider
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit wurde zu einem Wolfsreiter aufgewertet
TEXT.Italian: Unit upgraded to a Wolf Rider
TEXT.Spanish: Unit upgraded to a Wolf Rider

TEXT.English: Oops, your unit turned himself into a baboon!
TEXT.French: Oops, your unit turned himself into a baboon!
TEXT.German: Uups, Eure Einheit hat sich selbst in einen Trottel verwandelt!
TEXT.Italian: Oops, your unit turned himself into a baboon!
TEXT.Spanish: Oops, your unit turned himself into a baboon!

TEXT.French: Strange mushrooms grow around you
TEXT.German: Komische Pilze wachsen um Euch herum.

TEXT.English: You summon a pack of very confused penguins
TEXT.French: You summon a pack of very confused penguins
TEXT.German: Ihr habt einige sehr verwirrte Pinguine beschworen.
TEXT.Italian: You summon a pack of very confused penguins
TEXT.Spanish: You summon a pack of very confused penguins

TEXT.English: A confused unit is summoned from another dimension, he proclaims the glory of the Archos empire.
TEXT.French: A confused unit is summoned from another dimension, he proclaims the glory of the Archos empire.
TEXT.German: Eine verwirrte Einheit wurde aus einer anderen Dimension herteleportiert. Sie proklamiert die Herrlichkeit des Spinnenimperiums.
TEXT.Italian: A confused unit is summoned from another dimension, he proclaims the glory of the Archos empire.
TEXT.Spanish: A confused unit is summoned from another dimension, he proclaims the glory of the Archos empire.

TEXT.English: Unit Enraged by the Avatar of Wrath
TEXT.French: Unité enragée par l'Avatar du Courroux
TEXT.German: Der Avatar des Zorns hat eine Einheit mit dem Zorn angesteckt.
TEXT.Italian: Unit Enraged by the Avatar of Wrath
TEXT.Spanish: Unit Enraged by the Avatar of Wrath

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous êtes %s2."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid %s2."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous protégez le monde."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr beschützt die Welt."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous détruisez le monde."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr zerstört die Welt."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous utilisez %s2."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr benutzt %s2."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous êtes un membre du Conseil."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid ein folgsames Ratsmitglied."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous traitez bien votre peuple."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid gut zu Eurem Volk."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous traitez mal votre peuple"
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid schlecht zu Eurem Volk."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous possédez [NUM2:le:la:les:les] %s2."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Euch gehört das %s2."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous manquez de grace."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid unter meiner Würde."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous êtes charmant."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr seid charmant."

TEXT.French: %D1: "Vous semblez fidèle."
TEXT.German: %D1: "Ihr scheint vertrauenswürdig."

TEXT.French: %s1_CorpName a été fondé à %s2_CityName!
TEXT.German: Die Gilde %s1_CorpName wurde in der Stadt %s2_CityName gegründet!

TEXT.English: %s1_CorpName has been founded in a distant land!
TEXT.French: %s1_CorpName a été fondé dans un pays lointain!
TEXT.German: Die Gilde %s1_CorpName wurde in einem weit entferntem Land gegründet!
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CorpName has been founded in a distant land!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CorpName has been founded in a distant land!

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_CorpName[COLOR_REVERT] s'est répandue à %s2_CityName.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Die Gilde %s1_CorpName[COLOR_REVERT] wurde verbreitet in %s2_CityName.

TEXT.French: Des troupes ennemies envoyées par %s2_CivDesc ont été repérées près de %s1_CityName !
TEXT.German: Truppen aus dem %[s2_CivDesc] sind in der Nähe der Stadt %s1_CityName gesichtet worden!

TEXT.French: Doctrine Préférée:
TEXT.German: Lieblings-Staatsform

TEXT.French: Merveille Préférée:
TEXT.German: Lieblings-Wunder

TEXT.French: %D1_Change[ICON_UNHEALTHY] from Blight
TEXT.German: %D1_Change[ICON_UNHEALTHY] durch die Dürre

TEXT.French: %D1_Change% dû à la Mana de Loi
TEXT.German: %D1_Change% vom Ordnungsmana

TEXT.French: %D1_Change[ICON_HEALTHY] dû à la Mana de Vie
TEXT.German: %D1_Change[ICON_HEALTHY] vom Lebensmana

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 dû à la Mana de Pensée
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%%F2 vom Geistesmana

TEXT.French: %s1_promotion a changé de main
TEXT.German: %s1_promotion hat den Besitzer gewechselt

TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName a été [NUM1:tué:tuée] !
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName wurde getötet!

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] dû à la Mana d'Esprit
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] vom Seelenmana

TEXT.French: Dû aux citoyens mécontents: %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION]
TEXT.German: Produktion durch Unzufriedenheit: %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION]

TEXT.English: While defending, your %s1_UnitName has killed a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: En se défendant, votre %s1_UnitName a tué un %s2_EnUName de nationalité masquée !
TEXT.German: Euer %s1_UnitName konnte sich erfolgreich gegen angreifende %s2_EnUName verteidigen!
TEXT.Italian: While defending, your %s1_UnitName has killed a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: While defending, your %s1_UnitName has killed a %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: While defending, your %s1_UnitName was destroyed by a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: En se défendant, votre %s1_UnitName a été détruit par un %s2_EnUName de nationalité masquée !
TEXT.German: Euer %s1_UnitName konnte dem Angriff vom %s2_EnUName nicht standhalten und wurde getötet!
TEXT.Italian: While defending, your %s1_UnitName was destroyed by a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: While defending, your %s1_UnitName was destroyed by a %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.French: (%d1_Num de %d2_Num)
TEXT.German: (%d1_Num von %d2_Num)

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ne peut pas être construit par votre civilisation ([LINK=literal]%s1_civ[\LINK])[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Kann nicht von deiner Zivlisation errichtet werden ([LINK=literal]%s1_civ[\LINK])[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ne peut pas être construit par votre civilisation ([LINK=littéral]%s1_civ[\LINK])[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Kann von Eurer Zivilisation nicht aufgestellt werden ([LINK=literal]%s1_civ[\LINK])[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: Conseil Supérieur
TEXT.German: Hoher Rat

TEXT.French: Haut Conseiller
TEXT.German: Ratsvorsitzender

TEXT.French: Favoris
TEXT.German: Favoriten

TEXT.French: Description rapide
TEXT.German: Kurze Beschreibung

TEXT.French: Description détaillée
TEXT.German: Ausführliche Beschreibung

TEXT.French: Sorts et Capacités Activées
TEXT.German: aktivierte Zauber und Fähigkeiten

TEXT.French: Force: %d1_Num / %d2_Num
TEXT.German: Stärke: %d1_Num / %d2_Num

TEXT.French: Must be level %d1_Num to enter
TEXT.German: benötigt Stufe %d1_Num oder höher, um eingelassen zu werden

TEXT.English: Prevents units of level lower than %d1_Num from entering the city
TEXT.French: Prevents units of level lower than %d1_Num from entering the city

TEXT.Italian: Prevents units of level lower than %d1_Num from entering the city
TEXT.Spanish: Prevents units of level lower than %d1_Num from entering the city

TEXT.French: , Requiert: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Tout Nœud[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: , erfordert: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Manabrunnen[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [SPACE](Un citoyen doit y travailler pour l'améliorer en %s1_ImpName, %s2_CivName seulement)
TEXT.German: [SPACE](Stadt muss das Geländefeld bearbeiten um zur Stufe %s1_ImpName zu gelangen, nur %s2_CivName)

TEXT.English: The Barbarians have decided that you have grown too civilized. The truce is ended.
TEXT.French: Les Barbares ont décidé que vous êtes devenu civilisé. La trêve est finie.
TEXT.German: Die Barbaren haben entschieden, dass Ihr zu zivilisiert geworden seid. Der Waffenstillstand ist beendet.
TEXT.Italian: The Barbarians have decided that you have grown too civilized. The truce is ended.
TEXT.Spanish: The Barbarians have decided that you have grown too civilized. The truce is ended.

TEXT.English: Barnaxus has been defeated but his pieces remain, claimed by the unit that destroyed him. If the Luchuirp can regain those pieces and get them to one of their cities Barnaxus can be rebuilt.
TEXT.French: Barnaxus a été vaincu et ses morceaux gisent, réclamés par l'unité qui l'a détruit. Si les Luchuirp peuvent regagner ces pièces et les ramener dans l'une de leurs villes, Barnaxus sera reconstruit.
TEXT.German: Barnaxus wurde zerstört, aber seine Teile bleiben erhalten und werden von der Einheit verwahrt, die ihn besiegt hat. Wenn die Luchuirp diese Teile zurückerobern und in eine ihrer Städte bringen, kann Barnaxus neu erschaffen werden.
TEXT.Italian: Barnaxus has been defeated but his pieces remain, claimed by the unit that destroyed him. If the Luchuirp can regain those pieces and get them to one of their cities Barnaxus can be rebuilt.
TEXT.Spanish: Barnaxus has been defeated but his pieces remain, claimed by the unit that destroyed him. If the Luchuirp can regain those pieces and get them to one of their cities Barnaxus can be rebuilt.

TEXT.French: Ville
TEXT.German: Stadt

TEXT.English: Changing this Civic will cause units to abandon you.
TEXT.French: Changer cette Doctrine poussera certaines unités à vous abandonner.
TEXT.German: Der Wechsel der Gesellschaftsform wird dazu führen, dass sich Einheiten von Euch abwenden.
TEXT.Italian: Changing this Civic will cause units to abandon you.
TEXT.Spanish: Changing this Civic will cause units to abandon you.

TEXT.French: Fermer
TEXT.German: Verlassen

TEXT.English: World spells can only be cast once per game. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.French: Les Sorts Mondiaux ne peuvent être lancés qu'une fois par partie. Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir lancer %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.German: Weltzauber können nur einmal pro Partie gewirkt werden. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr %s1_ActionName zaubern wollt?
TEXT.Italian: World spells can only be cast once per game. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.Spanish: World spells can only be cast once per game. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?

TEXT.English: Casting this spell may cause you to declare war on another civilization. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.French: Lancer ce sort vous fera déclarer la guerre à une autre civilisation. Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir lancer %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.German: Das Wirken dieses Zaubers könnte einen Krieg mit einer anderen Zivilisation auslösen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr %s1_ActionName zaubern wollt?
TEXT.Italian: Casting this spell may cause you to declare war on another civilization. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?
TEXT.Spanish: Casting this spell may cause you to declare war on another civilization. Are you sure you want to cast %s1_ActionName?

TEXT.English: You have researched Infernal Pact and allowed the Infernals to enter the world. Would you like to abandon your civilization and play as Hyborem instead?
TEXT.French: Vous avez fondé le Voile Cendré et permis aux Infernaux d'entrer dans le monde. Voulez-vous abandonner votre civilisation et jouer Hyborem à la place.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt den Aschfahlen Schleier gegründet und den Infernalen Zugang zu dieser Welt verschafft. Wollt Ihr Euch von Eurer Zivilisation abwenden und als Hyborem weiterspielen?
TEXT.Italian: You have researched Infernal Pact and allowed the Infernals to enter the world. Would you like to abandon your civilization and play as Hyborem instead?
TEXT.Spanish: You have researched Infernal Pact and allowed the Infernals to enter the world. Would you like to abandon your civilization and play as Hyborem instead?

TEXT.English: Wait! Let's examine the City first...
TEXT.French: Examiner la ville
TEXT.German: Stadt untersuchen

TEXT.English: The Infernal Grimoire was everything we hoped, it held the secrets of Hell, but those secrets were not given lightly. We had only just started our celebration when scouts reported a Balor approaching the city gates. Apparently Hell meant to reclaim its prize.
TEXT.French: Le Grimoire Infernal était tout ce en quoi nous avons espéré, il détenait les secrets de l'Enfer, mais ces secrets n'ont pas été donnés à la légère. Nous avions à peine commencé notre célébration quand les éclaireurs ont signalé un Balor approchant des portes de la ville. Apparemment l'Enfer a réclamé son du.
TEXT.German: Das Höllische Grimoire war so, wie wir es erhofft hatten. Es enthielt die Geheimnisse der Hölle, doch diese Geheimnisse konnten dem Buch nicht einfach entrissen werden. Wir hatten gerade erst mit den Feiern begonnen, als Späher meldeten, dass ein Balor auf die Stadttore zuhielt. Anscheinend wollte die Hölle nun ihren Preis einfordern.
TEXT.Italian: The Infernal Grimoire was everything we hoped, it held the secrets of Hell, but those secrets were not given lightly. We had only just started our celebration when scouts reported a Balor approaching the city gates. Apparently Hell meant to reclaim its prize.
TEXT.Spanish: The Infernal Grimoire was everything we hoped, it held the secrets of Hell, but those secrets were not given lightly. We had only just started our celebration when scouts reported a Balor approaching the city gates. Apparently Hell meant to reclaim its prize.

TEXT.English: Changing your State Religion will cause units to abandon you.
TEXT.French: Changer de Religion d'État poussera des unités à vous abandonner.
TEXT.German: Der Wechsel der Staatsreligion [ICON_RELIGION] wird dazu führen, dass sich Einheiten von Euch abwenden.
TEXT.Italian: Changing your State Religion will cause units to abandon you.
TEXT.Spanish: Changing your State Religion will cause units to abandon you.

TEXT.French: Sélectionnez votre trait :
TEXT.German: Wählt Eure Bonuseigenschaft:

TEXT.French: Campement
TEXT.German: Siedlung

TEXT.English: Would you like this to be a City or Settlement?
TEXT.French: Voulez-vous que ce soit un campement ou une ville ?
TEXT.German: Wollt Ihr eine Stadt oder eine Siedlung gründen?
TEXT.Italian: Would you like this to be a City or Settlement?
TEXT.Spanish: Would you like this to be a City or Settlement?

TEXT.English: has completed the Divine version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.
TEXT.French: a complété la version divine de l'Autel des Luonnotar.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt die göttliche Version des Altars des Luonnotar errichtet.
TEXT.Italian: has completed the Divine version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.
TEXT.Spanish: has completed the Divine version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.

TEXT.English: has completed the Exalted version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.
TEXT.French: a complété la version exaltée de l'Autel des Luonnotar.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt die verherrlichende Version des Altars des Luonnotar errichtet.
TEXT.Italian: has completed the Exalted version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.
TEXT.Spanish: has completed the Exalted version of the Altar of the Luonnotar.

TEXT.English: has completed all of the lesser towers and is now free to build the Tower of Mastery.
TEXT.French: a terminé la construction de toutes les tours mineures et peut maintenant construire la Tour de Maîtrise.
TEXT.German: Ihr habt alle niederen Türme errichtet und könnt nun den Turm der Macht errichten.
TEXT.Italian: has completed all of the lesser towers and is now free to build the Tower of Mastery.
TEXT.Spanish: has completed all of the lesser towers and is now free to build the Tower of Mastery.

TEXT.German: Missionsbildschirm (Verfügbar ab Fall from Heaven II Version 0.40)
